charges.charge_description: Use of a communication facility to facilitate the commission of the crime of distribution of controlled subsance.(1s)

charges.charge_disposition: The defendant pled guilty on 2/10/2012. Imprisonment - time served. 1 year supervised release. See judgment for additional terms of supervision. $100 Special Assessment due immediately. SRT HEARING 8/7/2013: Defendant given allocution. Defendant plead True to Violation Two. Government not going forward as to violation One. Court accepts defendants plea of True. Revoked: Time Served and no SRT to follow, defendant advised of 14 day deadline to file his appeal

charges.charge_description: Count 1: Conspiracy to Distribute and Possess w/int to distribute cocaine (+5KGS); Count 2:  Conspiracy to Distribute and Possess with Intent to Distribute Heroin (+1KG and Cocaine (+500 GRAMS)(1-2)
